statements: SELECT * FROM manufacturing_progress;
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM manufacturing_progress WHERE status = 'in_progress';
SELECT item_id, item_name, status FROM manufacturing_progress ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT item_name, status FROM manufacturing_progress WHERE item_id = 5;
SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM manufacturing_progress;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_progress ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT item_name, status FROM manufacturing_progress WHERE status='Completed' ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM manufacturing_progress WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT item_id, item_name, status FROM manufacturing_progress WHERE status IN ('In Progress', 'Pending') ORDER BY item_id;
SELECT DISTINCT status FROM manufacturing_progress ORDER BY status DESC;
SELECT * FROM item_progress WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT status, timestamp FROM item_progress WHERE item_id = 2;
SELECT process_id, process_name FROM manufacturing_process;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_process WHERE process_id = 3;
SELECT process_id, start_time, end_time FROM manufacturing_process WHERE process_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM item_progress WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT process_name, start_time FROM manufacturing_process WHERE process_id > 100 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT item_id, status, timestamp FROM item_progress ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT process_id, end_time FROM manufacturing_process WHERE start_time < '2022-01-01' AND end_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY process_id ASC;
SELECT item_id, status FROM item_progress WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM ManufacturingProcess;
SELECT id, item_name, status FROM ManufacturingProcess WHERE status='Completed';
SELECT item_name, status, timestamp FROM ManufacturingProcess ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, item_name, status FROM ManufacturingProcess WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT item_name, status FROM ManufacturingProcess WHERE status='In Progress' ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ManufacturingProcess WHERE status = 'Completed' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT item_name, status FROM ManufacturingProcess WHERE status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT m.id, m.item_name, h.status, h.timestamp FROM ManufacturingProcess m INNER JOIN ManufacturingHistory h ON m.id = h.item_id WHERE h.status = 'Failed';

SELECT m.item_name, s.status_name, h.timestamp FROM ManufacturingProcess m JOIN ManufacturingHistory h ON m.id = h.item_id JOIN ManufacturingStatus s ON h.status = s.status_name ORDER BY h.timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_items, status FROM ManufacturingProcess GROUP BY status HAVING total_items > 10 ORDER BY total_items DESC;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_process;
SELECT item_id, start_time, end_time FROM manufacturing_process WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT stage_id, stage_name FROM production_stage ORDER BY stage_name DESC;
SELECT history_id, item_id, stage_id FROM item_history WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, status FROM stage_logs WHERE status = 'error' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_process WHERE status='completed';
SELECT item_id, end_time FROM manufacturing_process ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT stage_name, MAX(duration) FROM production_stage GROUP BY stage_name;
SELECT item_id, stage_id, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM item_history GROUP BY item_id, stage_id;
SELECT manufacturing_process.*, stage_logs.status AS log_status FROM manufacturing_process LEFT JOIN stage_logs ON manufacturing_process.item_id = stage_logs.stage_id;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_process;
SELECT item_id, status FROM manufacturing_process WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT item_id, timestamp FROM manufacturing_process ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT production_id, start_time, end_time FROM production WHERE end_time IS NOT NULL;
SELECT item_id, qc_status, qc_timestamp FROM quality_control WHERE qc_status = 'Passed';
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_process WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT item_id, timestamp FROM quality_control ORDER BY qc_timestamp DESC;
SELECT item_id, packager FROM packaging WHERE packaging_timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND packaging_timestamp < '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM shipping WHERE destination = 'USA' ORDER BY shipping_timestamp ASC;
SELECT production_id, item_id, start_time, end_time FROM production WHERE end_time IS NOT NULL;
